name: Sir_Slimestone's Starfighter
description:
This is a 2D Action Arcade game where you pilot one of three ships and attempt to destroy as many enemies as you can in 5 minutes. Dodge torpedoes, destroy enemy ships, use powerful abilities, and fight powerful bosses!

Don't forget to join my discord server and give feedback: https://discord.gg/x4RqCwD2pR

Starfighter is still in development but is very playable, feel free to give suggestions!
